prefixMsg: Our prefix for this server is `$0$`.
helpDescription:
We're Gumball and Penny and we aim to make any server we're at in a fun place!
When in doubt on any command use `$0$help [$1$]`.
name: Name
betAtLeast: You have to bet at least <a:gpCoin:898355693193662464>$0$!

error.cmd: There was an error when trying to execute that command!
error.noProfile: You haven't created a profile yet! To create a profile use `$0$profile create`.
error.noMention: You have to mention someone! Make sure you write the mention instead of copying it.
error.noPerm: You have no permisison to use this command! üí¢
error.botNoBan: We don't have permission to ban members!
error.botNoManageMsgs: We don't have permission to manage messages!
error.noNumberToDelete: You have to indicate how many messages you want to delete!
error.noAdd: You can't get any more money! üòß
error.botNoKick: We don't have permission to kick members!
error.noSelf: You can't use this command on you!
error.wontWorkOnBot: That won't work on a bot! üòÇ
error.botNoManageRoles: We don't have permission to manage roles!
error.botNoManageChannels: We don't have permission to manage channels!
error.noPet: You haven't bought a pet yet! To buy one go to the Awesome Store using
error.noChangePetName: You can't change your pet's name!
error.petAlreadyHasName: Your pet has that name already!
error.noPetHudChosen: You didn't choose a Pet HUD!
error.noHavePetHud: You don't have that Pet HUD!
error.noPetToAdoption: You have no pet to send to adoption!
error.noPrefixChosen: We need to know the desired prefix!
error.hasProfileAlready: You already have a profile created, you can't create another! üí¢
error.alreadyHasPetHud: You already have this Pet HUD!
error.noVIPForPetHud: You need to be VIP to buy this Pet HUD!
error.alreadyHasPet: You already have a pet! If you want another one you have to give yours to adoption using `$0$pet sendtoadoption`.
error.noVIPForPet: You need to be VIP to buy this pet!
error.samePrefix: That's the same prefix we're using!
error.sameLanguage: That's the same language we're speaking right now!
error.noModerateMembers: We don't have permission to moderate members!

daily.againIn: You can get money again in **$0$**.
daily.received: You received your **<a:gpCoin:898355693193662464>$0$** of today! To get more <a:gpCoin:898355693193662464>150 (x2 for VIP) use `$1$vote`.

give.self: Seriously you just tried to give yourself money?
give.thanksBut: Thanks, but you'll need that money more than us! üòÅ

jankenpon.draw: It's a draw! You have your money refunded.

pet.nameMaxIs: The name's maximum character limit is **$0$**. That name has **$0$**.
pet.nameChangedTo: You pet's name was changed to **$0$**.
pet.petHudChangedTo: Your Pet HUD was changed to **$0$**.
pet.botNoPet: We don't have a pet! Yet...

profile.wasCreated: You profile was created! Add a description with `$0$profile setdescription [$1$]`.
profile.nicknameMaxIs: The nickname's maximum character limit is **$0$**. That nickname has **$1$**.
profile.descMaxIs: The description's maximum character limit is **$0$**. That description has **$1$**.

quiz.mainDescription:
These are the available quiz themes.
Every quiz will take 10 questions. Each correct answer in 15 seconds gives you 1 point, and anyone can join just by answering correctly.
quiz.toStart: Press the _Start_ button to start the quiz!
quiz.alreadyPlaying: There's a quiz being played already in this channel! Start a new one on another channel or wait for the quiz to end.

setlanguage.noLanguage: You have to select a language!
setlanguage.select: Select one of the languages below.
setlanguage.isNow: Now we'll speak in English üá∫üá∏ in this server.

setprefix.isNow: Our prefix for this server is now `$0$`.

shop.welcome:
Welcome to the Awesome Store!
Here you can buy some stuff with the money you have saved so far.
Use the buttons below to navigate through the store!
shop.boughtHUD: You bought the HUD **$0$**! To equip it use `$0$profile sethud [$1$]`.
shop.boughtPetHud: You bought the Pet HUD **$0$**! To equip it use `$0$profile sethud [$1$]`.
shop.boughtPet: You bought 1 **$0$**! To give it a name use `$1$pet setnickname [$2$]`.
shop.toBuyHud: Use `$0$shop buy hud [$1$]` to buy or `$2$shop view hud [$3$]` to see.
shop.toBuyPetHud: Use `$0$shop buy pethud [$1$]` to buy or `$2$shop view pethud [$3$]` to see.

timeout.whyTimeUsOut: Why do you want to time us out? üò¶
timeout.timeSelfOut: Did you just try time yourself out? üòÜ
timeout.youCannotTimeOut: You can't timeout or remove **$0$**'s timeout!
timeout.cannotTimeOut: We can't time anybody out. Check the role order!
timeout.wrongTimeFormat: You have to indicate the time with a valid format! (e.g.: 30s / 30m / 3h / 3d)!

vip.click: Click on the button below to buy the VIP status!
vip.deprecated: VIP status automatization has been temporarily deprecated (for a big while). To get VIP status please contact D34dlyK1ss#0101.

vote.click: Click on the button below to vote!

which.noSelect: You have to select an available anime! Use `$0$help which` $1$

automessages.description:
Toggle the automatic messages!
If enabled, we'll answer certain messages with funny things.

avatar.description: Look at your avatar or at a server member's!

coinflip.description: Flip the coin and place your bets!

daily.description: You will receive <a:gpCoin:898355693193662464>300 each day you use this command!

help.description: If you don't know, it's your problem! :unamused:

jankenpon.description: Let us play _Rock, Paper, Scissors_ and place your bet on who wins!

match.description: Check if you're compatible with somebody!

members.description: We'll show the server's member count!

timeout.description: We'll time a server member out for a determined duration (maximum of 7 days)!

pet.description:
Check your pet or someone's!
Available options: `setname`, `sethud`, `sendtoadoption`.

profile.description:
Check your profile or someone's!
Available options: `create`, `set [description/hud/nickname]`.

random.description: We'll tell a number between 1 and the indicated number. The default is 100.

ranking.description: Check the top 10 users who use us!

setlanguage.description: Change our language for this server.

setprefix.description: Change our prefix for this server.

shop.description:
Go shopping in the Awesome Store!
Available options: `buy`, `view`.

userinfo.description: All info from a server member!

vote.description: Vote for us to receive <a:gpCoin:898355693193662464>150 (300 for VIP)!

which.description:
Which anime character are you?
Available anime: `akame ga kill`, `attack on titan`, `code geass`, `death note`, `higurashi` , `jojo`, `kakegurui`, `mirai nikki`, `noragami`, `one punch man`, `parasyte`, `psycho-pass`, `steins;gate`.
